data.name: Penguin Game
data.description:
This game is a multiplayer game with a simple gorilla tag inspired locomotion, penguins, and multiplayer. What else would you need from a game?

Thanks to my awesome friends who helped test (TbirdTheGoat, RandomGuy9000, benjivr, Golden, and Bluurvr. Also my amazing discord server!

Also THIS GAME IS NOT A GORILLA TAG COPY! THIS GAME IS A FAN GAME MADE FOR PEOPLE WHO WANNA JUST HANG OUT AND CHILL!

changelog.change_log:
dev hats
room changing
out of the map fix

-new computer
-name changing
-everyone else can see your color change
-everyone else can see you change your cosmetics
-fix for ball being allowing you to get out of the map
-made water in water attack look better
-made water make you float
-normalized some textures to look better
-tunnels isn't as dark now
-fixed some backend stuff
-made the arms not flop as much
-added a ice rink in back of jungle

Hey! This update brings quite a lot to unpack. There is a new gamemode located in slides, tunnels has been extended and the penguins have found something spooky back there
color changing, and hats (no one can see the colors or hats at the moment, but its still super cool. I'm working on fixing it) Anyway have fun!

Hey, This update has a HUGE amount of new things

-added map loading
-added a little camera in tunnels
-added accounts
-added banning
-added new music in shop
-removed the hangout spot in jungle
-removed bananas
-added little ores in tunnels
-fixed a few things with water attack
-added arms to the player
-added player count back

Hey! quick update

-added player count
-added Code Of Conduct
-fixed water animation (hopefully)
-added better player model

Hey! This update brings quite a lot

-new map located in shop
-texture changes
-more of a "penguin style"
-new gamemode named water attack
-two new cosmetics in shop (they still don't work lol)
-fixed some network issues
-added a soccor ball that most people can play with
-fixed the heavy penguin issue (i have no idea what happened lol)
-and other stuff i can't remember

Have Fun!

fixed lights and made them look better
extended tunnels a bit more
new map Penguinvile
other stuff i can't remember
added to applab, and changed stuff within the files
Nothing of a big change, just back to the origianl map, and changed stuff internally. Also look at the PC! Have Fun!

Patch Notes

-Added tunnel to new map
-adjusted mirror
-added body and eyes (try jumping and leaning you're head forward lol)
-moved player into home area
-fixed eyes
-better lighting in and outside
